text: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, to further the promise of life in Christ Jesus,
to Timothy, my dear child. Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord!
I am thankful to God, whom I have served with a clear conscience as my ancestors did, when I remember you in my prayers as I do constantly night and day.

As I <st data-num="3403" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>, I <st data-num="1971" class="">long</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may be <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>.
I recall your sincere faith that was alive first in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice, and I am sure is in you.
Because of this I remind you to rekindle God’s gift that you possess through the laying on of my hands.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> a <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1167" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> of <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4995" class="">self-control</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> of the <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> about <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, a <st data-num="1198" class="">prisoner</st> for <st data-num="846">his sake</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> accept your <st data-num="4777">share of suffering</st><n id="3" /> for the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.

He is the one who <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> us with a <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="2821" class="">calling</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">based on</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="4286" class="">purpose</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>, <st data-num="1325" class="">granted</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> <st data-num="166" class="">began</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="5319">made visible</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2015" class="">appearing</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>. He<n id="1" /> has <st data-num="2673" class="">broken</st> the power of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> and <st data-num="5461" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="861" class="">immortality</st> <st data-num="5461">to light</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>!

<st data-num="1519" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739">this gospel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="5087" class="">appointed</st> a <st data-num="2783" class="">preacher</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1223">Because of</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">in fact</st>, I <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> as I do.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the one in <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> my <st data-num="4100">faith is set</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="3866" class="">protect</st> what has been <st data-num="5442" class="">entrusted</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">until</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2192">Hold</st> to the <st data-num="5296">standard</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="5198" class="">sound</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> and do so <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="2" />
Protect that good thing entrusted to you, through the Holy Spirit who lives within us.
You know that everyone in the province of Asia deserted me, including Phygelus and Hermogenes.

May the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="1656" class="">mercy</st> to the <st data-num="3624" class="">family</st> of <st data-num="3683" class="">Onesiphorus</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> <st data-num="404" class="">refreshed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="254" class="">imprisonment</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> when he <st data-num="1096" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4516" class="">Rome</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4709" class="">eagerly</st> <st data-num="2212">searched for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> me.
May the Lord grant him to find mercy from the Lord on that day! And you know very well all the ways he served me in Ephesus.
